body_html: I'm not sure I understand how they are related. Just to clarify, in my case I don't care what name scope is used inside the variable scope -- it can be either a new name scope or the original one. I just want the correct variable name, which ideally should be independent of the surrounding name scope.

body: I'm not sure I understand how they are related. Just to clarify, in my case I don't care what name scope is used inside the variable scope -- it can be either a new name scope or the original one. I just want the correct variable name, which ideally should be independent of the surrounding name scope.
